title: #92Noon! Friday Feast
description: Charch and Nordo host. First hour is a NFC check in with Danny Parkins of 670 the Score in Chicago, Siny on the Pack and longtime Lions Vox Dan Miller. Chad Greenway in studio 2nd hour. A music bit with Brian Oake and Gregg Swedberg, then TV producer/director Steve Conrad finishes the show!
